A: 1. Technology includes tools, machines, materials, and sources of _(a) power (b) water (c) air (d) food
2. Technology helps to make work and lives _ for people.(a) harder (b) easier (c) longer (d) shorter
3. Computers and mobiles are _ technology.(a) the only (b) not the only (c) old (d) new
4. Technology is when people use knowledge to create a new thing to _ problems.(a) ignore (b) create (c) solve (d) forget
5. Technology makes it easy to use matches instead of _ to produce fire.(a) water (b) stones (c) wood (d) metal
6. Technology is the application of _ for practical purposes.(a) art (b) history (c) science (d) music
7. Which of these is an importance of technology in cooking?(a) Using firewood (b) Using stones (c) Using sand (d) Using leaves
8. Washing clothes with a machine is an example of technology's use in _(a) cooking (b) washing (c) preserving (d) relaxation
9. Using a refrigerator is a technology for _ food.(a) cooking (b) washing (c) preserving (d) eating
10. Watching movies on TV is an example of technology for _(a) work (b) study (c) relaxation (d) cleaning
11. Moving from one place to another by car is a product of technology for _(a) communication (b) transportation (c) banking (d) farming
12. Speaking to one another using mobile phones is a product of technology for _(a) transportation (b) communication (c) traffic control (d) home
13. Traffic lights are a product of technology for _(a) banking (b) farming (c) traffic control (d) business
14. ATM machines are products of technology used in _(a) farming (b) banking (c) home (d) business
15. Harvesters are products of technology used in _(a) home (b) business (c) farming (d) banking
16. A refrigerator is a product of technology found in the _(a) office (b) school (c) home (d) factory
17. A photocopy machine is a product of technology used in _(a) farming (b) home (c) business (d) transportation
18. ICT stands for Information and _ Technology.(a) Control (b) Communication (c) Computer (d) Creative
19. ICT gadgets are used to transmit and _ information.(a) store (b) receive (c) send (d) delete
20. A mobile phone is an example of an ICT _(a) tool (b) gadget (c) machine (d) material
21. ICT gadgets help individuals and organizations to _ messages quickly.(a) hide (b) forget (c) communicate (d) erase
22. ICT gadgets usually operate by using _ from mains sockets or batteries.(a) water (b) gas (c) energy (d) oil
23. One use of ICT gadgets is to make work and _ easier and faster.(a) cooking (b) communication (c) driving (d) sleeping
24. ICT gadgets help individuals and organizations to _(a) shrink (b) grow (c) disappear (d) hide
25. ICT gadgets help to increase _(a) noise (b) sadness (c) productivity (d) confusion
26. ICT gadgets allow people to _ at home and anywhere.(a) sleep (b) play (c) work (d) eat
27. ICT gadgets bring people _ together.(a) far (b) apart (c) closer (d) sometimes
28. ICT gadgets make teaching and learning more _(a) difficult (b) complicated (c) easier (d) boring
29. ICT gadgets are also used for _(a) fighting (b) entertainment (c) crying (d) arguing
30. Shape construction involves making _-dimensional shapes.(a) 1 (b) 2 (c) 3 (d) 4
31. A cylinder is an example of a _-dimensional shape.(a) flat (b) 2 (c) 3 (d) square
32. One method used in shape construction is _(a) cutting (b) gluing (c) folding (d) painting
33. Which of these is a material used for shape construction?(a) Plastic (b) Glass (c) Paper (d) Fabric
34. A funnel can be constructed using _(a) metal (b) wood (c) paper (d) glass
35. A building is a structure with walls and a _(a) floor (b) door (c) roof (d) window
36. A house is an example of a _(a) car (b) building (c) tree (d) river
37. Shelter is considered one of the basic _ of life.(a) wants (b) needs (c) luxuries (d) dreams
38. A school building is an example of an _ building.(a) residential (b) assembly (c) educational (d) business
39. A church is a type of building used as a _ center.(a) business (b) worship (c) hospital (d) factory
40. The ability to do work is called _(a) force (b) power (c) energy (d) motion
B: 1. What makes work and lives easier for people? _________
2. What product of technology includes bicycles and cars? _________
3. What type of gadget transmits and receives information? _________
4. What is one method used in shape construction? _________
5. What is a structure with walls and a roof? _________
C: 2. Name one importance of technology in daily life.
4. What is the main function of ICT gadgets?
answers_C: Application of science for practical purposes.
A structure with walls and a roof.
